Name: DefaultAttack
Description: The AutoAttack when nothing can be load.

Name: Coup d'bouteille
Description: Launch a small coup d'bouteille that inflicts {Damages[0]} damages to target.
If a monster is damaged, the FireMage is surrounded by a <<FireShield>>

Name: Coup d'bambou
Description: Hit the enemy with the strength of the wind and the spirit of the bambou and deal {Damages[0]} damages to target.
When a target is hit, you have {OtherValues[0]}% chance to trigger <<WindSpirit>>.

Name: Energy ball
Description: Launch a small power ball that inflicts that {Damages[0]} damages to target.

Name: Explosing ball
Description: Launch a small power ball that inflicts that {Damages[0]} damages to target.
the ball exploses at the impact applying {Damages[0]*0.5} damages to the enemy monsters surronding the target by {OtherValues}.
